name: fantasta_server
description: Fantasta server that entertain HTTP request from fantasta_mobile

scripts.stop: docker stop grafana prometheus fantasta_server fantasta_mongo
scripts.docker-test-keep: docker-compose -f ./docker-compose.yml -f ./docker-compose.test.yml up -d --build --remove-orphans && docker exec -it fantasta_server npm run test
scripts.docker-test: docker-compose -f ./docker-compose.yml -f ./docker-compose.test.yml up -d --build --remove-orphans && docker exec -it fantasta_server npm run test ; docker-compose down
scripts.docker-test-unit: docker-compose -f ./docker-compose.yml -f ./docker-compose.test.yml up -d --build --remove-orphans && docker exec -it fantasta_server npm run test-unit ; docker-compose down
scripts.docker-test-integration: docker-compose -f ./docker-compose.yml -f ./docker-compose.test.yml up -d --build --remove-orphans && docker exec -it fantasta_server npm run test-integration ; docker-compose down
